'''1.15.1''' is a minor update to {{JE}} released on December 17, 2019,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-15-1|Minecraft 1.15.1|December 17, 2019}}</ref> which improves performance and fixes a few bugs in [[Java Edition 1.15|1.15]]. This is the final version released in 2019.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Dolphin]]'''
* Now can not spawn in [[bubble column]]s.

=== General ===
'''Performance'''
* Optimized [[chunk]] rendering performance, especially for chunks with many different [[block]] states.

'''Network handling'''
* Improved network handling of invalid [[biome]] IDs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes
|fixedin=1.15.1,1.15.1 Pre-Release 1
|;From released versions before 1.15
|96174|Highlighted slot darkening.
|126856|When auto-jump is enabled, the game checks an incorrect block to decide whether the player should jump or not.
|135050|{{cd|NullPointerException}} while tessellating block model.
|150508|Resource pack format was not incremented to 5.
|152516|Dolphins can spawn in soul sand bubble columns.
|163571|Walls are lit too dark when connecting to ice.
|;From 1.15
|167482|Corrupt chunk causes force upgrading a world to fail.
|167530|Anvils causing {{cd|java.lang.StackOverflowError}}.
|otherissuescount=2
}}

'''Other'''
* Fixed an error that was spammed to the game's log files caused by custom [[monster spawner]]s spawning [[villager]]s.
* Fixed a crash that occurred in the [[Realms]] screen.
